TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HDInsightClusterResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a HDInsightCluster along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetHDInsightClusterResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetHDInsightCluster method.
